default.homepage: Congratulations, You're Now Online! Now share your site with the world! Make sure that Google can find your site, create a buzz on social networks and get some feedback.
This site was created using %1. Create your own for FREE.
Вы подтверждаете удаление?: Do you really want to delete it?
Данная опция недоступна на вашем пакете: This option is not available for your package.
Необходимо повысить статус до пакета Биз: You must upgrade to the Business Package to use coupons.
admin.store.deliveries: Shipping lets you pass on shipping rates directly from carriers, according to the package destination, weight, and dimensions.
admin.store.products: Manage products in your store from here. Click on a product to edit it. Navigate between categories using the links on the left.
admin.store.coupons: Add coupons to your store and give your buyers a discount on their cart. Your buyers will only be able to use one coupon per total purchase.
admin.store.settings.form: Choose whether your checkout form requires extra information from your customer.
Ваш заказ принят. В ближайшее время с ва: Your order has been created successfully.
В интернет-магазине на сайте %1 совершен: New order available at your online store (%1)
Сообщение успешно отправлено: The email has been sent successfully
Отображается в качестве заголовка окна б: Text that is displayed in the browser tab.
Список ключевых слов, разделенных запяты: List your keywords separated by commas.
A summary of what your page is about.
Запретить поисковым системам индексирова: Disallow search engines to find this page
Disallow search engines to find my site
admin.favicon: A favicon is a small image associated with your website. When set, it displays in the address bar, tab and bookmarks of your site. Your favicon will be automatically set on every page of your site.
admin.stat: Track your site's performance and analyze where your visitors coming from, how long they stay on each page and what keywords they are using to find you.
admin.sitemap: The sitemap is dynamically generated on our server and, therefore, is always up to date with any pages that you add or remove from your site. You can view your sitemap by adding sitemap.xml to the end of your domain name. Example: %1
admin.meta: ex. Google Webmaster Tools verification meta tag
admin.redirect: Migrating your site over to %1 and want to keep your SEO ranking in search engines? Use 301 Redirects to automatically transfer visitors to relevant page on your new %1 site.
admin.disable: Please provide some message to temporary disable your website.
Ваш броузер не поддерживает данную возмо: Browser does not support ant drag&drop options
Вы превысили допустимый объем хранящихся: You have exceeded the allowed storage size
Страница, которую вы читаете, не существ: The page you're looking for can't be found
Проверьте правильность адреса и попробуй: Check the web adress for mispelled words and try again.
Please use the following button to add something.
Имя должно содержать только латинские бу: Folder name should contain only alphabet symbols and numbers
Пожалуйста укажите корректный e-mail: Please enter a valid e-mail address
Имя сайта должно содержать только латинс: Sitename should contain only letters, digits and minus
Расширение импортируемого файла должно б: Extension of the imported file should be .txt or .csv
